main event: An 11 1/2 year old girl observed an unidentified flying object that was oval in shape and emitted a flashing light in the sky over Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania on July 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as being about as bright as a light bulb and flashed like a star., The object was observed for about 5 minutes., The course of the object was a straight flight from East to West at an altitude of about 60 degrees., The apparent speed of the object was estimated at around 50,000 miles per hour., The conclusion drawn was that the object was an aircraft, although there was no physical evidence to confirm this.
